vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Senaah (H5570) of the tribe of Levi before time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.7; including Hodaviah (H1938I) and Judah (H3063I); also called Hassenaah at Neh.3.3
Also named: se.na.ah (סְנָאָה "Hassenaah" H5570H)
§ Senuah or Hasenuah [with the art] = "bristling"
a Benjamite
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   ancestro de Salú; tribu de Benjamín; (b)   padre de Judá; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈西努，哈西努亞 [帶冠詞] 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "發怒"
一名便雅憫人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈西努，哈西努亚 [带冠词] 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "发怒"
一名便雅悯人
